Reaping Disruption.name: Reaping Disruption
Reaping Disruption.flavor: Through your strike, you disrupt the flow of your foe’s life force, shattering its natural resilience.
Reaping Disruption.onHit: 3[W] + chosen ability modifier damage, and the target gains vulnerable 5 to all damage (save ends).

Fearsome Revival.name: Fearsome Revival
Fearsome Revival.flavor: Just as your injuries overwhelm you, you hear the voice of the Raven Queen, and it vitalizes your soul. To the shock of your adversaries, you stand instantly, unleashing a vigorous shout.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: You fail a death save.

Effect: You reroll your death save with a +5 bonus. If this roll’s result is 20 or higher, in addition to being able to spend a healing surge, you can also immediately stand (no action).
Fearsome Revival.effect: You reroll your death save with a +5 bonus. If this roll’s result is 20 or higher, in addition to being able to spend a healing surge, you can also immediately stand (no action).

Reaper's Repast.name: Reaper's Repast
Reaper's Repast.flavor: Your devastating strike channels some of your enemy’s vitality into you.
Reaper's Repast.effect: You can spend a healing surge.
